document_data.name: Amalee Winter
document_data.mainbody: Lady '''Amalee Winter''' was a member of the noble [[House Wyvernspur]] of [[Cormyr]] who lived in the late 10{{th}} and early 11{{th}} centuries [[DR]].
document_data.History: Amalee Winter married into House Wyvernspur sometime before the {{YearlinkName|980}}. Her husband was [[Gould Wyvernspur]] and with him she sired two sons. The older son, [[Gerrin Wyvernspur]], was born in 980 DR. Gould's and Amalee's younger son was [[Finder Wyvernspur]] who would eventually become a renowned [[bard]], one of the founding members of the [[Harpers]], and subsequently, a [[deity]].{{Cite polyhedron/119/Forgotten Deities: Finder Wyvernspur|23}}
